name: agni-gen
description: Agni is a tool to help you organize your application structure based on simple principles.

scripts.test: export DEBUG=agni; export NODE_ENV=development; mocha --report lcovonly -R spec ./test/**/*.test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Kaique da Silva <kaique.developer@gmail.com>
